Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Dorsett City London in London (Shoreditch), you'll be minutes from The Gherkin and Tower of London. This 4-star hotel is close to London Bridge and St. Paul's Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 267 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

With a stay at Dorsett City London in London (Shoreditch), you'll be minutes from The Gherkin and Tower of London. This 4-star hotel is close to London Bridge and St. Paul's Cathedral.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The Gherkin - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Tower of London - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Royal Exchange - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Tower Bridge - 1 km / 0.6 mi
HMS Belfast - 1 km / 0.6 mi
London City Hall - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
London Bridge - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Barbican Arts Centre - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
The Shard - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Borough Market - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Museum of London - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Globe Theatre - 1.6 km / 1 mi
St. Paul's Cathedral - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
London Stock Exchange - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Old Bailey - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 26.4 km / 16.4 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 40.3 km / 25 mi
London (STN-Stansted) - 47.8 km / 29.7 mi

The preferred airport for Dorsett City London is London (LCY-London City).
